name: Pokeworld (Pre-Alphav0)
description:
This is the First Official Build of the Pre-Alpha Test for Pokeworld outside of Discord. This will be updated Several Times a Week, for those who do purchase it. All those who have donated previously and are in the VIP Server or have VIP Role on the Main Server Contact Bioblaze via Discord.

I Repeat THIS IS IN EXTREME Pre-Alpha Development, using Core Systems that were wrote for Discord and bringing them into Unreal Engine 4, using the same principles. There will be downtime, and Updates quite often. Sometimes annoyingly so untill we Reach Alpha Stage. 

I hope you will Join us on this Journey <3 Anyone who does Purchase will get a Role in the Public Server, and a Invite to a Private one.
